description.en: The course provides an overview of the assistive devices and orthoses used. Case studies are analyzed and suitable assistive devices are recommended.
description.et: Aines antakse ülevaade kasutusel olevatest abivahenditest ja ortoosidest. Lahendatakse patsiendijuhtumeid ning leitakse sobivad abivahendid lähtuvalt patsiendi probleemist.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide students with knowledge of the possibilities of using assistive devices and orthoses in case of various diseases and injuries.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse õpetamise eesmärgiks on anda algteadmised abivahendite ja ortooside kasutamise võimalustest erinevate haiguste ja vigastuste korral.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. Uses the EASTIN environment to search for assitive devices and to find suitable devices and orthoses for the patient;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Kasutab EASTIN keskkonda abivahendite otsimiseks ja patsiendile sobivate abivahendite leidmiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Analyzes the suitability of various assistive devices and orthoses based on the patient's problem;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Analüüsib erinevate abivahendite ja ortooside sobivust lähtuvalt patsiendi probleemist;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Adapts walking aids and assesses the suitability of the wheelchair according to the patient.
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Kohandab käimisabivahendeid ja hindab ratastooli sobivust lähtudes patsiendi probleemist.
